sen.j: 社会詠（しゃかいえい）は和歌や俳句の種別の一つである。
sen.e: Shakaiei is a type of tanka and haiku.
Shakaiei is a type of tanka as well as a haiku.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: Shakaiei is a type of tanka as well as a haiku.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 人の生活する場である社会と社会に対する認識等を主題として詠んだ歌のことをいう。
sen.e: It means poems of which subjects are the society, which is the field of human life, knowledge on the society, etc.
It refers to poetry in which the subject matter is society, encompassing the field of human life, knowledge of society, etc.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: It refers to poetry themed on the society in which people live and the recognition of society.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 短歌の対象を分類する概念で、山川草木、花鳥風月等の自然を詠みこんだいわゆる自然詠と対照される分野であるとされる。
sen.e: It is a concept to classify the object of tanka and it is the field compared with sizenei that includes natural scenery, kacho-fugetsu (beauties of nature, the traditional themes of natural beauty in Japanese aesthetics), and so on in a poem.

It is a concept of classifying the object of tanka, a field that contrasts with sizenei, which includes natural scenery, kacho-fugetsu (the beauty of nature, the traditional themes of natural beauty in Japanese aesthetics), and so on in poetry.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: Concept of classifying the subjects of tanka and contrasts with the field of shizenei which incorporates elements of nature such as mountains, rivers, plants and trees as well as flower, birds, the wind and the moon.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 社会詠は、1920年代後半のいわゆるプロレタリアート短歌、第二次世界大戦後の「人民短歌」の「人民大衆の生活実感を根底とした」歌、いわゆる「60年安保」を詠んだ歌、65年以降のベトナム戦争の歌などが知られている。
sen.e: So-called proletariat tanka in the latter half of 1920's, poems "based on real feeling of life of general public" of "Jinmintanka" after the Second World War, tanka that includes so -called 60-nen anpo (Japan-U.S. Security Treaty of 1960), tanka related to Vietnamese War after 1965, etc. are known as shakaiei.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外措置
sen.e: The so-called proletariat tanka in the latter half of 1920s, poems "based on real feelings in the life of the general public" of "Jinmintanka" after the Second World War; tanka, which includes so-called 60-nen anpo (the Japan-U.S. Security Treaty of 1960), and tanka related to the Vietnam War after 1965, etc., are known as shakaiei.
sen.cmt: punctuation
sen.e: Well known shakaiei include the proletariat tanka of the latter half of the 1920s, post-war 'jinmin tanka' (people's tanka) poems which were 'based on life experiences of the general public,' poems based on the 'rokuju-nen anpo' (Japan-U.S. Security Treaty of 1960), and post 1965 poems about the Vietnam War.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。原文の「」に合せて"を'に訂正しました。

sen.j: 日本社会において高度経済成長が達成された1970年代以降は、直接的な社会詠として事件等を取り上げることが大変困難となっている。
sen.e: 1970's, in which rapid economic growth was achieved in Japanese society, and after that, it became very difficult to take up incidents, etc. as the direct shakaiei.,
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外措置
sen.e: In the 1970s, when rapid economic growth was achieved in Japanese society, and subsequently, it became very difficult to take up incidents, etc., directly through means of shakaiei.
sen.cmt: article
sen.e: Since the 1970s in which Japanese society achieved rapid economic growth, it became very difficult to raise incidents directly through shakaiei.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 現在は現代社会のひずみから生じる諸問題を取り上げる社会性のある内向的な諷詠が社会詠の主流となっている。
sen.e: At present, the mainstream of shakaiei is introverted poetic composition which takes up social problems occurring from stress in society.
Currently, the mainstream of shakaiei is introverted poetic composition that takes up social problems occurring due to stress in society.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: Current mainstream shakaiei consists of introvert poetic composition that raises problems arising from the strain of modern society.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 「赤紙の表紙手擦れし国禁の書（ふみ）を行李（かうり）の底にさがす日」（石川啄木）。
sen.e: "Akagamino hyoshitezureshi kokkinno fumiwokorino sokonisagasuhi"(the day on which I look for prohibited book with worn out by frequent opening red cover page in a kori (woven container).)(Takuboku ISHIKAWA)

"Akagamino hyoshitezureshi kokkinno fumiwokorino sokonisagasuhi" (the day I look for a prohibited book with a cover worn out by the frequent opening of the red cover page in a kori (woven container)." (Takuboku ISHIKAWA)
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: Akagami no Hyoshi Tezureshi Kokkin no Fumi wo Kori no Soko ni Sagasu Hi' (lit. The day I searched the bottom of my trunk for the state-banned book with the well-worn red cover) (Takuboku ISHIKAWA)
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 啄木は、自分の経済的な苦しみの原因は社会にあると考え、社会主義思想に関心を持ち国禁の書を読みふけった。
sen.e: Takuboku considered that causes of his economic problems were from the society and had interest in socialism ideology and got absorbed in reading books banned by the state.
Takuboku, who believed his economic problems were caused by society, developed an interest in the ideology of socialism and would immerse himself in books that had been banned by the state.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: Takuboku believed his economic problems were caused by society, developed an interest in the socialist ideology and would immerse himself in books that had been banned by the state.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 生活詠的社会詠の先駆けと言える。
sen.e: We can call this the pioneer of shakaiei.
We can call this the pioneer of shakaiei.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: This can be said to be a forerunner of seikatsuei (poems about everyday life) type shakaiei.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。ハイフン削除しました。

sen.j: 「小工場に酸素溶接のひらめき立ち砂町四十町夜ならむとす」（土屋文明）
sen.e: "Shokojoni sansoyosetsuno hiramekitachi Sunamachi shijucho yorunaramutosu" (flames of oxygen welding are seen in a small plant, to forty towns in Sunamachi, the night is coming) (Fumiaki TSUCHIYA)。This is a fresh shakaiei that paid attention to people who work in backstreet factories from early in the morning until late in the evening as well as other people working in the area.

"Shokojoni sansoyosetsuno hiramekitachi Sunamachi shijucho yorunaramutosu" (flames of oxygen welding are seen in a small plant; to forty towns in Sunamachi, the night is coming) (Fumiaki TSUCHIYA): this new shakaiei called attention to people who work in backstreet factories from early in the morning until late in the evening, as well as other people working in the area.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: Shokojo ni Sansoyosetsu no Hiramekidachi Sunamachi Shijucho Yoru Nara Mutosu' (lit. The flames of oxygen welding are seen in a small factory, night will descend on the forty blocks of Sunamachi) (Fumiaki TSUCHIYA).
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。一原文一訳文の例外処理seen small factory→seen in a small factory

sen.j: 町工場に朝早くから夜遅くまで懸命に働く人々、そこに働く庶民たちに思いを寄せた新鮮な社会詠である。
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: This original shakaiei was devoted to those who work hard in small factories from early in the morning until late at night as well as the common people working in these areas.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。一原文一訳文の例外処理ハイフン削除しました。called を削除an night→at night

sen.j: 「世をあげし思想の中にまもり来て今こそ戦争を憎む心よ」（近藤芳美）。
sen.e: "Yowoageshi shisononakani mamorikite imakoso sensowo nikumu kokoroyo" (my spirit to hate war, on which I set great value against ideology prevailing in the world is very precious now) (Yoshimi KONDO)

"Yowoageshi shisononakani mamorikite imakoso sensowo nikumu kokoroyo" (my spirit of hatred for war, on which I set great value against the ideology prevailing in the world, is very precious now)." (Yoshimi KONDO)
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: Yo wo Ageshi Shiso no Naka ni Mamorikite Imakoso Sensowo Nikumu Kokoro yo' (lit. My hatred for war, on which I place great value against the prevailing ideology of the world, is very precious now) (Yoshimi KONDO).
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 若いころマルクス主義に傾倒し、キリスト教にも触れた近藤の社会の現実に触れた鋭い眼差しと清新な抒情は社会派歌人と言われるに相応しい。
sen.e: Sharp gaze and fresh lyricism touching social reality of Kondo, who had once devoted to Marxism and touched Christianity are suitable for being called a socially aware poet.

The keen gaze and fresh lyricism touching on the social reality of Kondo, who was once devoted to Marxism and touched on Christianity, are suitable attributes for one who is called a socially aware poet.
sen.cmt: grammar
sen.e: The sharp eye and fresh lyricism of Kondo, who admired Marxism when he was young and who also came into contact with Christianity, are ideally suited for someone who can be said to be poet of the social school of thought.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。
